title: Monster House
writer: Dan Harmon, Rob Schrab, Pamela Pettler
short_cast: Mitchel Musso, Sam Lerner, Spencer Locke, Steve Buscemi, Kathleen Turner, Jason Lee, Jon Heder, Maggie Gyllenhaal, Catherine O'Hara, Fred Willard, Nick Cannon, Kevin James

desc: A trio of friends sets out to expose the terrors of a vacant neighborhood house, which appears to have a craving for people — and a life of its own.
